titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce for individuals the maximum rate of tax on unrecaptured section 1250 gain from 25 percent to 15 percent.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/27/2004--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce capital gain and alternative minimum tax rates on unrecaptured Section 1250 (gain from dispositions of certain depreciable realty) gain for individual taxpayers.
